extendedInfo.description: **Updated for 2014-15 tax year from today's budget**In addition to being a highly accurate UK PAYE tax calculator, this is the only app on the market that lets you work backwards from any figure (tax/ni/student loan etc) to find the gross and give a complete breakdown.Features:* Tax Breakdown* NI Breakdown* Pension Breakdown* Tax years supported*   2014/15*   2013/14*   2012/13*   2011/12*   2010/11*   2009/10*   2008/09* Student Loan repayments* Pension contributions* Age related benefits* Tax codes (ending in L,P,Y,T or K)* Blind Persons Allowance* Enter figures in Year/Month/Week/Day/Hour* View results in Year/Month/Week/Day/Hour/Percentage of Gross/Percentage of Net* Reverse calculate from a Net figure* Reverse calculate from a Tax figure* Reverse calculate from a NI figure* Reverse calculate from a Total Deductions figure* Reverse calculate from a HMRC pension contributions figure* Reverse calculate from a Student Loan figure* Compare any two sets of figures easily by seeing the differences in the same stlye breakdown screen* Updates figures live as you type* Save preferences

reviews.comment: Clear breakdowns. The baseline comparison and net to gross calculation are very useful features
reviews.author: A Google User
